pr_title: Fix missing Jaeger client version in native mode

timeline.message:
Fix missing opentracing version in native mode

Fixes: #10399

timeline.bodyText: /jaegerversion would be better since it's the Jaeger client version and not OpenTracing version
timeline.author: pavolloffay

timeline.bodyText:
Is this executed also in the native mode?
Wouldn't it be better to assert on the exact string or use https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger-client-java/blob/master/jaeger-client/src/main/java/io/jaegertracing/client/Version.java#L29?
timeline.author: pavolloffay
